parking.group6.csc413.projectmap.Adapters

Class AppRating

  • java.lang.Object
    • parking.group6.csc413.projectmap.Adapters.AppRating

  • public class AppRating
extends java.lang.Object
    AppRating class handles the click on the "Rate us " on navigation and pops up the custom dialogue and directs the user to google play for rating the app.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    csc 413 group 6

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AppRating() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void app_launched(android.content.Context mContext)
      This method checks the Preferences for user choice and accordingly displays the option to rate the app by calling the showratedialog method
      static void showRateDialog(android.content.Context mContext, android.content.SharedPreferences.Editor editor)
      Displays the Dialog to rate the app / not show the dialog again, User choice is then stored in Preferences.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
